doc.title: Zofia/Roza
doc.plot: Zofia suspects that her family is hiding a secret from her. But Zofia has a secret of her own. She works as a call girl under the name of Roza. And it is Roza who is offered the chance to discover the mysterious truth about her family, when she gets a call from a stranger who is after more than just her body. He believes he is on a mission from God, and that Roza has an ordained role in a grand cosmic plan. If she gets in the car, if she accepts his offer, she will discover a self even more complex than he imagines, and she will have to confront the ghosts of a buried past.
